mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (title, summary, content, event_time, location, speaker_user_id, banner_id,create_user_id,update_user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{eventTime}, #{location}, #{speakerUserId}, #{bannerId},#{createUserId}, #{updateUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, ei.file_path AS bannerFilePath, cu.real_name AS createUserName, uu.real_name AS updateUserName, su.real_name AS speakerName FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_image ei ON e.banner_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN t_system_user cu ON e.create_user_id = cu.id LEFT JOIN t_system_user uu ON e.update_user_id = uu.id LEFT JOIN t_system_user su ON e.speaker_user_id = su.id

SELECT u.id, u.account, u.email,u.real_name FROM event_user_register eur JOIN t_system_user u ON eur.user_id = u.id WHERE eur.event_id = #{id} ORDER BY eur.create_time DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
